channel.title: Gustav Janssons devlog
channel.description: This blog is a try to me keep motivates and a way to see my progress on my current projects. Let’s see how it goes!

item.title: Week 50
item.description: This week I spent on cleaning up and refactoring euphoria code. Getting real close to zero warnings in clang-tidy

item.title: Week 49
item.description: This week I started refactoring euph to CamelCase and I expect it will take a while for it to be complete. I thought I was done with core but running clang-tidy checks on it it seems I’ve still missed a few spots

item.title: Week 48
item.description: This week I mostly thought about rendering design, trying to come up with a flexible structure for 3d shader, mesh layout and API design.

item.title: Week 47
item.description: This week I continued working on tred, adding test for vertex_layout, adding a custom assert library and continued working on the API design

item.title: Week 46
item.description: This week I continued working on tred and finally got multi window rendering working.

item.title: Week 45
item.description: This week I continued working on tred, refactoring, adding featuers and fixing issues.

item.title: Week 44
item.description: This week I continued working on tred. Cleaning up and mostly working on boring non-visible stuff. I started combining the 2d and 3d rendering and I think I have a pretty good API but it currently isn’t working. Have to look into why next week.

item.title: Week 43
item.description: This week I continued work on tred, cleaning up the code.

item.title: Week 42
item.description: This week I completed my entry for the spelsylt gamejam.

item.title: Week 41
item.description: This week I worked on the kodsnack spelsylt gamejam. Another week unti it finishes and the progress is pretty great.

item.title: Week 40
item.description: This week I continued work on ride, adding input and started on unit tests.

item.title: Week 39
item.description: This week I continued working on ride. Most of the selection is done and I’ve just started on text input.

item.title: Week 38
item.description: This week I continued working on ride.

item.title: Week 37
item.description: Theese past few weeks I have been moving to a new apparment and I’m finally getting back to coding again. This past week I’ve been gettng back into ride from scratch and finally have some progress. I can render text and scroll!

item.title: Week 32
item.description: This week I continued working on ride and started porting lite to C++ so I can get a better handle on how I want to structure ride.
